Job Title: CDL Class A - Dump Truck Driver

Location: Youngtown, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Southwest Concrete Paving, Co. prides our self on the quality of our work and with our extensive experience, the ability to deliver complex and challenging jobs. We are staffed with talented, hardworking, and tenured employees whose expertise in heavy civil / airfield construction has been the foundation of our success. For additional information about our company visit our website at www.swcp.us

POSITION SCOPE

The Class A Dump Truck Driver will be responsible for transporting aggregates and/or wet haul to the job sites. Drivers will be exposed to different situations and equipment in performing their assigned task. Drivers are responsible for maintaining their assigned equipment. This position may include day or night shift work, travel, overtime and weekend work up to the DOT maximum hours of service. EXTENDED OUT OF TOWN TRAVEL/WORK WILL BE REQUIRED.

Primary Duties

Ensures a safe work environment in compliance with all safety policies and procedures using the appropriate tools and equipmentExercises good judgment regarding work site access, unloading, and operation to and from work sitePerforms routine inspections and maintenance on equipment, report defects and repairs to maintenance department.Conducts daily pre-trip inspection of truck equipment and supplies such as tires, lights, brakes, fuel, and oilComply with all DOT, state, and local traffic and highway laws, rules and regulations and safely operate all equipmentOperates other heavy equipment and other construction related duties as requiredSafety, Safety, Safety comply with all DOT and company policies, procedures, and standards of safetyOther duties as assigned

Required Qualifications

Must be at least 21 years oldAbility to pass a full background check required for site accessValid Class A CDL with Tanker endorsement or the ability to acquire endorsementValid DOT Medical Examiner's CertificateAbility to pass a pre-employment drug testAbility to lift and move up to 50 poundsAcceptable MVR in accordance with Company Vehicle Program Policy

Southwest Concrete Paving Co. is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and an Equal Opportunity Employer of Protected Veterans and Individuals with Disabilities.

Pre-employment physical and drug testing are required.

If you require an accommodation to submit an application, please contact the HR Department at 623-516-0013. This is only to request an accommodation to the application process and is not to inquire about the status of your application.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
